name: CreateTrelloCard
description:
Create a new card in Trello.

Use this tool to create a new card on a Trello board. This is useful when you need to organize tasks or information by adding cards to your Trello workflow.

parameters.name: list_id_for_card
parameters.description: The ID of the list where the new card will be created.

value_schema.description: The ID of the list the card should be created in

parameters.name: card_name
parameters.description: The title or name of the card to be created in Trello.

value_schema.description: The name for the card

parameters.name: card_description
parameters.description: A detailed text description for the Trello card. This helps in adding more context or information about the card's purpose or content.

value_schema.description: The description for the card

parameters.name: card_position
parameters.description: Position of the new card. Use 'top', 'bottom', or a specific float value.

value_schema.description: The position of the new card. `top`, `bottom`, or a positive float

parameters.name: card_due_date
parameters.description: The due date for the Trello card, formatted as a string. Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD) for consistency.

value_schema.description: A due date for the card

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the card in YYYY-MM-DD format, or `null` if not applicable.

value_schema.description: The start date of a card, or `null`

parameters.name: member_ids_to_add
parameters.description: A list of Trello member IDs to add to the card.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to add to the card

parameters.name: label_ids
parameters.description: List of label IDs to add to the card. Provide IDs as strings in a list format.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to add to the card

parameters.name: attachment_url
parameters.description: A URL starting with `http://` or `https://` to be attached to the card upon creation.

value_schema.description: A URL starting with `http://` or `https://`. The URL will be attached to the card upon creation.

parameters.name: attachment_file_path
parameters.description: The local file path to be attached to the Trello card. This file will be uploaded when the card is created.

parameters.name: attachment_mime_type
parameters.description: The MIME type of the attachment for the Trello card. Maximum length is 256 characters.

value_schema.description: The mimeType of the attachment. Max length 256

parameters.name: copy_card_source_id
parameters.description: The ID of a card to copy properties from into the new card.

value_schema.description: The ID of a card to copy into the new card

parameters.name: copy_properties_from_source
parameters.description: Specify properties to copy if using `idCardSource`. Use `all` or a comma-separated list of: `attachments,checklists,customFields,comments,due,start,labels,members,stickers`.

value_schema.description: If using `idCardSource` you can specify which properties to copy over. `all` or comma-separated list of: `attachments,checklists,customFields,comments,due,start,labels,members,start,stickers`

parameters.name: map_view_address
parameters.description: The address for use with the Map View in Trello. This can enhance location-based features.

value_schema.description: For use with/by the Map View

parameters.name: location_name
parameters.description: The name of the location for use with the Map View in Trello.

value_schema.description: For use with/by the Map View

parameters.name: map_coordinates
parameters.description: Coordinates for the Map View in the format latitude,longitude.

value_schema.description: For use with/by the Map View. Should take the form latitude,longitude

parameters.name: card_display_role
parameters.description: Specifies how the card should be displayed. Options: `separator` for visual separation, `board` for linking to a Trello board, `mirror` for linking to a Trello card, and `link` for a general URL link.

value_schema.description: For displaying cards in different ways based on the card name. Board cards must have a name that is a link to a Trello board. Mirror cards must have a name that is a link to a Trello card.

parameters.name: card_completion_status
parameters.description: Indicate if the card's status is complete. True means the card is complete, and false means it is incomplete.

value_schema.description: Whether the status of the card is complete

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for the card

value_schema.description: The name for the card

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: The description for the card

value_schema.description: The description for the card

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The position of the new card. `top`, `bottom`, or a positive float

value_schema.description: The position of the new card. `top`, `bottom`, or a positive float

parameters.name: due
parameters.description: A due date for the card

value_schema.description: A due date for the card

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date of a card, or `null`

value_schema.description: The start date of a card, or `null`

parameters.name: dueComplete
parameters.description: Whether the status of the card is complete

value_schema.description: Whether the status of the card is complete

parameters.name: idList
parameters.description: The ID of the list the card should be created in

value_schema.description: The ID of the list the card should be created in

parameters.name: idMembers
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to add to the card

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to add to the card

parameters.name: idLabels
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to add to the card

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to add to the card

parameters.name: urlSource
parameters.description: A URL starting with `http://` or `https://`. The URL will be attached to the card upon creation.

value_schema.description: A URL starting with `http://` or `https://`. The URL will be attached to the card upon creation.

parameters.name: mimeType
parameters.description: The mimeType of the attachment. Max length 256

value_schema.description: The mimeType of the attachment. Max length 256

parameters.name: idCardSource
parameters.description: The ID of a card to copy into the new card

value_schema.description: The ID of a card to copy into the new card

parameters.name: keepFromSource
parameters.description: If using `idCardSource` you can specify which properties to copy over. `all` or comma-separated list of: `attachments,checklists,customFields,comments,due,start,labels,members,start,stickers`

value_schema.description: If using `idCardSource` you can specify which properties to copy over. `all` or comma-separated list of: `attachments,checklists,customFields,comments,due,start,labels,members,start,stickers`

parameters.description: For use with/by the Map View

parameters.description: For use with/by the Map View

value_schema.description: For use with/by the Map View

value_schema.description: For use with/by the Map View. Should take the form latitude,longitude

parameters.name: cardRole
parameters.description: For displaying cards in different ways based on the card name. Board cards must have a name that is a link to a Trello board. Mirror cards must have a name that is a link to a Trello card.

value_schema.description: For displaying cards in different ways based on the card name. Board cards must have a name that is a link to a Trello board. Mirror cards must have a name that is a link to a Trello card.
